languages.text: "Ну же, остался всего шаг: подтверди завершение протокола, чтобы уничтожить Летус, завладеть его богатствами и... освободить меня от этого невыносимого дозора".
"Go on, take the last step: confirm the execution of the directive, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."
languages.original_text: "Ну же, остался всего шаг: подтверди завершение протокола, чтобы уничтожить Летус, завладеть его богатствами и... освободить меня от этого невыносимого дозора".

traits.locale_text: "Go on, take the last step: confirm the completion of the protocol, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."
"Go on, take the last step: confirm the completion of the protocol, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."
"Go on, take the last step: confirm the completion of the protocol, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."
"Go on, take the last step: confirm the completion of the protocol, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."
"Go on, take the last step: confirm the execution of the directive, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."
"Go on, take the last step: confirm the execution of the directive, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."

languages.text: «Vamos, da el último paso: confirma la ejecución de la ordenanza, y, con ello, destruye Leethus, obtén sus riquezas y... libérame de esta vigilia insoportable».
languages.original_text: "Go on, take the last step: confirm the execution of the directive, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."

traits.locale_text: «Vamos, da el último paso: confirma la ejecución de la ordenanza, y, con ello, destruye Leethus, obtén sus riquezas y... libérame de esta vigilia insoportable».

languages.text: “来吧，完成最后的步骤——确认启动指令。这样一来，你就可以毁灭利瑟斯，带走所有财富……也让我从这无法忍受的守望之中获得解脱。”
languages.original_text: "Go on, take the last step: confirm the execution of the directive, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."

traits.locale_text: “来吧，完成最后的步骤——确认启动指令。这样一来，你就可以毁灭利瑟斯，带走所有财富……也让我从这无法忍受的守望之中获得解脱。”
“来吧，完成最后的步骤——确认协议完成。这样一来，你就可以毁灭利瑟斯，带走所有财富……也让我从这无法忍受的守望之中获得解脱。”

languages.text: 「さあ、最後の一歩を踏み出せよ。指令の完了を確認し、それによってリーザスを破壊し、その富を奪い、私をこの耐えがたい寝ずの番から解放しろ」
languages.original_text: "Go on, take the last step: confirm the execution of the directive, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."

traits.locale_text: 「さあ、最後の一歩を踏み出せよ。プロトコルの完了を確認し、それによってリーザスを破壊し、その富を奪い、私をこの耐えがたい寝ずの番から解放しろ」
「さあ、最後の一歩を踏み出せよ。プロトコルの完了を確認し、それによってリーザスを破壊し、その富を奪い、私をこの耐えがたい寝ずの番から解放しろ」

languages.text: "Nur zu, geht den letzten Schritt: Bestätigt die Durchführung der Direktive und zerstört damit Leethus. Nehmt Euch seine Reichtümer und ... erlöst mich von dieser unerträglichen Wache."
languages.original_text: "Go on, take the last step: confirm the execution of the directive, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."

traits.locale_text: "Nur zu, geht den letzten Schritt: Bestätigt die Durchführung der Direktive und zerstört damit Leethus. Nehmt Euch seine Reichtümer und ... erlöst mich von dieser unerträglichen Wache."

languages.text: « Allez-y, faites le dernier pas : confirmez l'exécution de la directive, et ce faisant, détruisez Leethus, emparez-vous de ses richesses et... délivrez-moi de cette veille insoutenable. »
languages.original_text: "Go on, take the last step: confirm the execution of the directive, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."

traits.locale_text: « Allez-y, faites le dernier pas : confirmez l'exécution de la directive, et ce faisant, détruisez Leethus, emparez-vous de ses richesses et... délivrez-moi de cette veille insoutenable. »
« Allez-y, faites le dernier pas : confirmez l'exécution du protocole, et ce faisant, détruisez Leethus, emparez-vous de ses richesses et... délivrez-moi de cette veille insoutenable. »

languages.text: "Durma, son adımı at. Talimatın uygulandığını onayla ve Leethus'ı yok edip zenginliklerini al. Beni de bu dayanılmaz nöbetten azat et."
languages.original_text: "Go on, take the last step: confirm the execution of the directive, and in so doing, destroy Leethus, take its riches, and... free me from this unbearable vigil."

traits.locale_text: "Durma, son adımı at. Talimatın uygulandığını onayla ve Leethus'ı yok edip zenginliklerini al. Beni de bu dayanılmaz nöbetten azat et."
"Durma, son adımı at. Protokolün tamamlandığını onayla ve Leethus'ı yok edip zenginliklerini al. Beni de bu dayanılmaz nöbetten azat et."
